A

addMark(int, int, char) - Method in class Board
Adds a given character into theBoard at the location specified by a row and column.
appointReferee(Referee) - Method in class Game
Assigns a given Referee object to theRef and calls the function, runTheGame(), to start the tic tac toe game.

B

Board - Class in <Unnamed>
Provides data fields and methods to create most of the logic for a tic tac toe game.
Board() - Constructor for class Board
Constructs a Board object by creating a blank 3 by 3 char array to represent a blank tic tac toe board.

C

clear() - Method in class Board
Clears theBoard.
Constants - Interface in <Unnamed>
Provides constant values that will be used in tic tac toe game program.

D

display() - Method in class Board
Displays the formatted tic tac toe board, complete with marks, hyphens, headers, and spaces.

E

emptySpace(int, int) - Method in class Board
Checks if a space at the given indices on the board is empty.

F

findName(char) - Method in class Player
Finds the name of the player associated with the given mark.

G

Game - Class in <Unnamed>
Provides data fields and methods that help create a starting point of a tic tac toe game.
Game() - Constructor for class Game
Constructs a new Game object by creating a new Board object and assigning it to theBoard.
getMark(int, int) - Method in class Board
Gets a character value, specified by a row and column, from theBoard.

I

isFull() - Method in class Board
Checks whether theBoard is full or not by checking markCount value.

O character
LETTER_X - Static variable in interface Constants

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Game
Starts a tic tac toe game.
makeMove() - Method in class Player
Asks the current player to enter the coordinates in which they want to place their mark.

O

oWins() - Method in class Board
checks if player o is the winner.

P

play() - Method in class Player
Allows current player to make a move, displays the board, then passes the turn to the other player until there is a winner or the game ends in a tie.
Player - Class in <Unnamed>
Provides data fields and methods to create a Java data-type, representing a player in a tic tac toe game program.
Player(String, char) - Constructor for class Player
Contructs a new Player object by assigning name and mark to the given String and char values.

R

Referee - Class in <Unnamed>
Provides data fields and methods to create a Java data-type, representing a referee in a tic tac toe game program.
Referee() - Constructor for class Referee
 
runTheGame() - Method in class Referee
Sets the opponents of each player, displays the board, and starts the game with Player X making the first move.

S

setBoard(Board) - Method in class Player
Sets the board.
setBoard(Board) - Method in class Referee
Sets the board to a given Board object.
setoPlayer(Player) - Method in class Referee
Sets Player O to a given Player object.
setOpponent(Player) - Method in class Player
Sets the opponent of the player.
setxPlayer(Player) - Method in class Referee
Sets Player X to a given Player object.
SPACE_CHAR - Static variable in interface Constants
Space character

X

xWins() - Method in class Board
Checks if player x is the winner.
